name: DefenceBourg
description:
This is a student game project that we realise in 3 months. It is an action tower defence game wich takes place in a medieval fantasy world.

 

How to play : 

You have to protect your town from the waves of ennemies that will try to destroy it.

To do that, you will have the choice to put towers and walls on the map and this will slow down and kill the ennemies.

If you want any other information, in the menu you can have acces to more explication of the game

 

Controls :

  • Mouse/Left click.
